post.body: Good job using Twitter to update the news. You're ahead of the curve on that.
@yatpundit Thanks guys. I had a blog I run for a sports team crash and it's on BlueHost. I was wondering if it was me or them.
Oh. yes.. I'm the one sorry now. I've been very sporadic on Twitter today!
Wait sorry for what?
I love Ellen!
Thank you! It was fun to write.
I have no idea who's richest. I mostly thought about what a glimpse into a typical life of an area might look like.
Watching some sort of ice/snow/rain situation coat my neighborhood.
Tell Wendy hello from R-Squared.
That hasn't happend since Twittergate over the summer.
Thank you so much for the compliment. I can't stop watching the show. I probably need an intervention.
Thank you so much! You make me feel less alone and terrified to have a column. srsly. And yep it's a show.
Yes. I think it is. Especially if you're trying jeans on or bathing suits. Find some sweat pants immediately and begin denial.
That's what I'm trying to figure out.. how to get someone to pay me to lose. It apparently works. But so far no takers.
I'm thinking some sort of glue? Or Aqua Net. That stuff works. 1980s tested you know?
thank you for that link.. sounds like a kindred spirit!
We are FB friends. So cool.
Kay don't worry. I might eat the flowerpot.
I've had it since I was 20. But I'm just starting to really pay attention to how it may affect my weight loss efforts.
I see Ithink. I have Hashimoto's and was told I'll be on medications for the rest of my life.
Retweeted and what nice post!
THank you!!! I did mine this morning.
excellent!
IT means they're wanting you to put in your information so they can steal you password.You can read about it on Twitter's blog.
AAK! It's a phishing scam. Don't try to log in!!
I like the just @god. No need to Gild the Lilly.
I feel safer knowing that. Thank you.
They should turn on the G Light in the sky over Gotham!
Sweet dreams.
G'night.
So tired.. G'night Twitter Friends.
Does anyone use BlueHost?
What if Real Housewives came to YOUR county? http://tinyurl.com/23coul/20081218/REGNIERCOLUMN/112189966
In this week's newspaper column I called out The Real Housewives. http://tiny.cc/WsK9j
Off to go Christmas Shopping.. yep. I'm just starting today cause that's how I roll! See you out there.
Laugh ItOff is now on Facebook. I really just cannot remember all my passwords. I may quit the internet.
How did Oprah cure her Thyroid disease? I didn't think you could do that.
R/T @RonisWeigh A day in the life of a Weight Watcher on Weight Watchers http://tinyurl.com/9m82ng
cc tweets Letter to my new boyfriend, the 2009 Diet. http://tinyurl.com/8awltc #diet, #weightloss09, #weightloss
Romance with damaged goods. http://tinyurl.com/8awltc
